Bear Prank:
In connection with your August 6th letter, I may
he all wet, hut I feel that no harm and a great deal of
good may he accomplished if the PCC, the Selective Ser¬
vice and the War Communications Board would have an official
statement from us calling attention to the difficulties
and handicaps we are operating under.
